text: So who attended? A few draft invitation lists from this event have been floating around. But we are the first to review the final, confirmed guest list, with table assignments. 140 of 550 were diplomats. 135 came on a list from Barrack. (4/7)
author: PostRoz

text: “It was very strange. I remember thinking, ‘Okay, who’s paying for this? And why?’ ” one guest who attended told us. Unlike other events, this dinner wasn’t a perk for donors. Instead, it was invite only. (3/7)
author: PostRoz

text: We focused on this event cause it brought together a few odd features of Trump’s inauguration—over the top spending ($8k/head) and a concentration of foreign guests. Trump was not even scheduled to attend at first—it was Tom Barrack’s show. (2/7) https://wapo.st/2Jdn7XR

text: Butina's DC apartment was raided by 12 FBI agents in April but she only arrested Sunday, when she was picked up in wake of Friday's indictment of GRU officers. FBI was afraid she had plans to leave DC, which would make her harder to monitor.
